original_text: Neither shall the inheritance remove from one tribe to another tribe; but every one of the tribes of the children of Israel shall keep himself to his own inheritance.
korean_text: 그 기업이 이 지파에서 저 지파로 옮기게 하지 아니하고 이스라엘 자손 지파가 각각 자기 기업을 지키리라

sentences.original_text: from one tribe to another tribe
but every one of the tribes of the children of Israel
shall keep himself to his own inheritance
